epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.connection

Class PriorityWaitingRequestQueue<T extends Request>

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.connection.PriorityWaitingRequestQueue<T>

  • public class PriorityWaitingRequestQueue<T extends Request>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sort the request to send in order to ensure the correct order of the answer
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade
